title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Eden huan mawi chantu Adama thlah 93
Eden huana nupa tuak khat 577
Eden par mawi chul hnu ti vul leh turin 96
Edenah rilru hrereng la 170
En rawh chhum zingah a lo kal 240
En ru an khai kang hmelmaten 233
En ru Pathian Beramno sual phurtu 213
En teh chhandamna kawl eng saw 342
En teh Chhandamtu chu an hruai ta 220
En teh Chhandamtu kan hmu ta 169
En teh u thawhlehna ni chu 226
Eng nge ka rilru a mangan 132
Eng nge sual tifai thei ang? 160
Eng vangin nge mipuite chu 260
Engkim kan hmuhte hian an fak 13
Engkimtithei Lalpa Leh Kan Pathian Chu 10
Engkimtithei Pa Pathian 551
Engtin nge ni ka Chhandamtu 184
Enna nunnem thimin ka vel a bawm 155
